Our reception area and ADA Accessible wheelchair ramp.
The lounge area with a Volcano Vaporizer on every table.
Our fish tank, games and lounge area with Volcano Vaporizers at every table.
Our water pipes are cleaned and sterilized repeatedly throughout the day.
Our counter area where Staff assist Members in choosing the medicine that best helps alleviate their specific symptoms.
Our mural was painted on site by Jeremy Fish, a good friend of the VR Family. It highlights Compassion, Community, Healing and our love for San Francisco.
A great painting by Jeremy Fish that was a part of his ‘Ghosts of the Barbary Coast’ show in 2008.
